pages.text: 97|1|hontoni ware wa, mitsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruan) o kudashita.
97|2|Mitsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
97|3|Mitsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru.
97|4|(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru.
98|1|Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo tashinkyo to mo, kare-ra ni meisho ga kuru made,(-do kara) hanareyou to shinakatta.
98|2|Mata arra kara no shito ga, jun Seina shokan o, yonde kika seru made wa.
98|3|Sono nakaniha, fumetsu no tadashi kiroku (okite) ga aru.
98|4|Keiten o sazukatte iru-sha-tachi ga, bunpa shita no wa, meisho ga kare-ra ni kite kara ato no kotodeatta.

98|5|Kare-ra no meiji rareta koto wa, tada arra ni tsukae, kare ni shinjin no makoto o tsukushi, junsei ni fukuju, kie shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai to, iu dake no kotodeatta. Kore koso shinsei no oshiedearu.
98|6|Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo, tashinkyo to mo, jigoku no hi ni (nagekoma re)te, sono naka ni eien ni sumu. Korera wa, shujo no naka saiaku no monodearu.
98|7|Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu-sha-tachi, korera wa, shujo no naka saizen no monodearu.
